comment: Membership in the class of partisan games. In John Horton Conway's On Numbers and Games, this is stated as "If ` L ` and ` R ` are any two sets of games, then there is a game ` { L | R } ` . All games are constructed in this way." The first sentence corresponds to the backward direction of our theorem, and the second to the forward direction. (Contributed by Emmett Weisz, 27-Aug-2021.)
